name: Volleyball (itch) (arifimran)
description:
I have made a feedback survey for this game. If you have played the game, please take the time to answer the survey. Your feedback is very much appreciated. Thank you.

https://forms.gle/cpnwZb3foSSMrtED6

Controls:

A - Move Left

D- Move Right

Space - Jump

Escape - Pause

Modes:

Co-Op - Control two characters and see how many times you can bounce the ball before hitting the ground

Versus - Go up against an AI opponent and try to beat it in a game of best out of 5.

Credits:

Surfside by axtoncrolley - https://opengameart.org/content/surfside
